timeline.activity: Patient developed fever after spraying pesticides in field
Patient developed left sided chest pain
timeline.symptom: Left sided chest pain, non radiating, diffuse pain, pain increased on inspiration

timeline.activity: Patient presented to casualty with left sided chest pain
timeline.symptom: Left sided chest pain, cough with expectoration, fever
timeline.diagnosis: Provisional Diagnosis: DIABETIC KETOACIDOSIS WITH ? LEFT LOBE PNEUMONIA WITH DENOVO TYPE 1 DM
timeline.treatment: IVF-NS @100ml/hr, INJ. HAI INFUSION @4ml/hr, INJ PAN 40mg iv/od, INJ ZOFER 4 mg iv/sos, INJ NEOMAL 1gm iv/sos, TAB PCM 650mg/po/sos

notes.physical_exam: General Examination: Moderately built, No pallor, icterus, cyanosis, clubbing, lymphadenopathy, edema of feet
notes.investigations: Vitals: Temp: 100.6, Bp: 110/70, PR: 111, Rr: 22, Spo2: 97, GRBS: 373mg/dl

timeline.activity: Patient complained of chest pain, cough with expectoration, and high grade fever
timeline.symptom: Chest pain, cough with expectoration, high grade fever, SOB grade 2-3
timeline.diagnosis: DKA, Left lower lobe pneumonia, Denovo detected type 1DM
timeline.treatment: Continue insulin infusion till acidosis resolved, Plan to bridge to subcutaneous insulin

notes.physical_exam: Vitals: Temp: 101, Bp: 120/70, PR: 116, Rs: BAE present, Left: MA, IAA, ISA - coarse crepts present and decreased air entry

timeline.activity: Patient still complained of cough, hemoptysis, and SOB on exertion
timeline.diagnosis: DKA, Left lobe pneumonia, Denovo detected type 1DM

notes.physical_exam: Vitals: Temp: 99, Bp: 120/70, PR: 90, Rs: BAE present, Left: MA, IAA, ISA - coarse crepts present and decreased air entry

timeline.activity: Patient's cough decreased, fever spikes yesterday, chest pain subsidied, appetite improved
timeline.diagnosis: DKA (resolved), Right upper lobe cavity present with left lobe surrounding consolidation, ?pulmonary Koch's, Denovo detected type 1DM

notes.physical_exam: Vitals: Temp: 100, Bp: 120/70, PR: 102, Rs: BAE present, Left: MA, IAA, ISA - coarse crepts present and decreased air entry

timeline.diagnosis: DKA (resolved), Right upper lobe cavity present with left lobe surrounding consolidation, ?pulmonary Koch's, Denovo detected type 1DM
